mapper.insert: insert into ITEMORDER (ITID, ORID, PRID, ITQUALITY, ITTOTALPRICE) values (#{itid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itquality,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ittotalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select ITID, ORID, PRID, ITQUALITY, ITTOTALPRICE from ITEMORDER
